titles.title: He Is Able To Deliver Thee

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
He is able
to deliver thee,
He is able
to deliver thee:

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Tho’ by sin opprest,
Go to Him for rest;

“Our God is able
to deliver thee”

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
‘Tis the grandest theme
thro’ the ages rung;

‘Tis the grandest theme
for a mortal tongue;

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
‘Tis the grandest theme
that the world e’er sung,

“Our God is able
to deliver thee.”

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
‘Tis the grandest theme
in the earth or main;

‘Tis the grandest theme
for a mortal strain;

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
‘Tis the grandest theme,
tell the world again,

“Our God is able
to deliver thee.”

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
‘Tis the grandest theme,
let the tidings roll,

To the guilty heart,
to the sinful soul;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Look to God in faith,
He will make thee whole,

“Our God is able
to deliver thee.”
